mapper.insert: replace into tb_jl_share_total(PDATE,USERNO,PNUM,RATE,CONSUMN,BONUS,STATUS) SELECT t1.FDATE, t1.TJNO, t2.PNUM, t2.RATE, t1.CONSUMN, t2.RATE * t1.CONSUMN / 100 AS BONUS, '0' FROM ( SELECT t1.FDATE, sum( t1.PRICE * t1.NUM ) AS CONSUMN, t2.TJNO FROM tb_jy_contract t1 JOIN tb_hy_user_relation t2 ON t1.USERNO = t2.USERNO AND t2.TJNO != '' WHERE t1.FDATE = #{fdate} AND t1.STATUS IN('3','6') GROUP BY t2.TJNO ) T1 JOIN ( SELECT t1.TJNO, t1.PNUM, IFNULL( t2.RATE, 0 ) AS RATE FROM ( SELECT TJNO, count( 1 ) AS PNUM FROM tb_hy_user_relation WHERE TJNO != '' GROUP BY TJNO ) t1 LEFT JOIN tb_jl_share_paras t2 ON t1.PNUM >= t2.MINNUM AND t1.PNUM <= t2.MAXNUM ) T2 ON t1.TJNO = t2.TJNO
